original: 吳郡烏程人，東吳官員。為孫權所親信的幕僚文臣，長隨孫權左右。夷陵之戰時，奉命募兵；後又為節度官，掌吳國軍糧大計。
text: Wujun Wucheng people, Soochow officials. The staff and ministers, who were trusted by Sun Quan, followed Sun Quan forever. During the battle of Yiling, he was ordered to recruit soldiers; later he was an officer of Jiedu, in charge of Wu's army and food plan.
